natives_american_inuit = {
	graphical_culture = inuitgfx
	color = { 0 255  255 }
	icon = 4
	
	unit = native_indian_archer
	
	provinces = {
		# North America
		#Removed
		# Greenland
		1104 1105 
	}
}
